https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dmLt1gkOn6PxjTzMGlaHpd7CVmV.jpg In A Journey Revisited, Mike Layland discovers the the contrast between the first journey which was documented in the 1967 film "Wheels Across a Wilderness", and this 2007 recreation of the journey. A Journey Revisited
